coreAttributes.name: peach
coreAttributes.description: A delicate, juicy fruit of the peach tree, which is often cultivated in temperate climates. It kind of looks like a butt if you squint...

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wipe)] off the peach and [npc.verb(take)] a big bite out of it. The sweet taste of the juicy fruit encourages [npc.herHim] to keep on going, and within a matter of moments [npc.sheHas] eaten the entire thing.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(wipe)] off the peach and [npc.verb(make)] [npc2.name] take a big bite out of it. The sweet taste of the juicy fruit encourages [npc2.herHim] to keep on going, and within a matter of moments [npc2.sheHas] eaten the entire thing.
